pi.style.confirm_load_unsaved.txt: 看起来您已经对当前样式做了更改。如果您在保存更改之前加载预设，您的更改将丢失。
pi.style.shade_borders.info: 与原版结构不兼容，应用于边框以给出一种提升的外观。
pi.style.dir_path.info: This is the vertical bar to the left of the page list that shows the path to the current page.
pi.style.gui_docs.info: This can be used to customize the style of the documentation displayed in supported GUI's
pi.style.invert_shade.info: Inverts the shade colours to instead give a sunken look.

pi.config.edit_repo_loc.info: In order to use edit mode you must clone the documentation repository and specify the location of the cloned ModDocs folder
pi.config.edit_repo_select_title: Specify absolute path to edit repo "ModDocs" folder
pi.config.reload_documentation.info: Checks for and downloads any documentation updates then reloads the GUI.
pi.config.set_pi_language: 设置 PI 文档语言
pi.config.set_pi_language.info: By default PI uses whatever language minecraft is using but this option allows you to override that and set a custom language.
pi.config.set_pi_language_note.info: Please note. Many languages will most likely not be supported by some mods. If you would like to help with translations learn how you can help by checking out the PI main page.
pi.config.max_tabs.title: 设置最大标签数
pi.config.max_tabs.info: This setting allows you to set the maximum number of tabs that can be opened simultaneously.
pi.config.et_fluid.info: If false the "Explain This" function will ignore fluids unless there are no other blocks within reaching distance.
pi.error.page_not_localized.info: It appears this page has not yet been translated to your selected language!
pi.error.page_not_localized_click_here.i: Click here to see available languages for this page or change your selected language in the PI option menu.
Or try a different mod version (Right click page -> Override mod version)
pi.button.language_override_page.info: Language override is currently enabled for this page. Click here to configure override.
pi.button.language_override_mod.info: Language override is currently enabled for this mod. Click here to configure override.
pi.error.page_lang_outdated: This page translation was written for a previous %s revision. This page may be outdated.

pi.md.link_confirmation.txt: Are you sure you want to open the following link in your browser?

pi.pagebtn.verified.info: This documentation was ether written or verified by a member of this mods development team.
pi.pagebtn.version_override.info: Click here to configure version override.
pi.update_manager.title: PI 更新管理器
pi.gui_in_gui.display_doc.info: Display Project Intelligence documentation linked to this GUI.
pi.msg.no_doc_found_for: Did not find any documentation related to %s
pi.msg.et_miss: No target found. Try looking at something interesting!
pi.info_screen.welcome.title: 欢迎使用 PI 文档！
pi.info_screen.welcome.text: This is an open source project created by brandon3055. The goal of this project is to create a truly universal documentation mod by leveraging the power of the minecraft community.  So how will this work? well for starters any mod developer can add documentation for their mods to PI. The problem is mod devs are busy people so most of them wont have time to deal with something like this and that in my opinion is a major issue with most of the current documentation mods.  PI aims to solve this problem by making it possible for anyone in the community to contribute by writing documentation for various mods using the relatively simple built in editor. They can then submit their documentation via PR and if it passes review it will be added to the online repository.
pi.info_screen.guide_intro.title: 这是什么？
pi.info_screen.guide_intro.text: This is the first launch introduction. It will walk you through some of the main features in project intelligence. If this is not your first time here then feel free to skip this intro.  Most features in PI are pretty self explanatory but there are a few less obvious features you may find useful.
pi.info_screen.basic_overview.title: 概览
pi.info_screen.basic_overview.text: Everything here should be pretty self explanatory. Hover your mouse over any of the arrows to view info about that item.
pi.info_screen.pi_interaction.title: 普通 PI 交互
pi.info_screen.pi_interaction.text: This is just a general overview of some of the different ways you can use PI. As you have probably already figured out you can open PI by pressing %s.  PI Also has an "Explain This" function which allows you to press %s while hovering your mouse over an item in an inventory to view any documentation related to that item. You can also press %s to view available documentation for a block or entity you are looking at in world.  PI GUI Notes: Whenever you open the main PI UI you will return to the previous page you had open. When you open PI for the first time in a session you will get the "Home Page" by default this is the Project Intelligence mod page but you can change this by right clicking on a page in the page list and selecting the "set as home page" option.
pi.info_screen.ui_style.title: UI样式
pi.info_screen.ui_style.text: This gui is extremely customizable! You can find the style settings by pressing the options button in the top right corner of PI. There you will find some builtin style presets and an option to edit the current preset which you can then save as your own custom preset!
pi.info_screen.contributing.title: 贡献者
pi.info_screen.contributing.text: If you would like to contribute by writing documentation for a mod then please check out then please check out the "Contribute" page in the PI documentation which you can find in... well.. PI!
pi.intro.arrow_info.back_forward.txt: Forward/Back buttons. These work like that back/forward buttons in a web browser allowing you to go back to previously visited pages then forward from there.
pi.intro.arrow_info.toggle_nav.txt: Allows you to hide/show the navigation window.
pi.intro.arrow_info.button_list.txt: This is a simple tree based navigation system where the root branch contains a list of mod pages. When you select a page from this list that page's sub pages will be displayed here if it has any. Otherwise the page will simply be highlighted.
pi.intro.arrow_info.current_directory.tx: This shows a truncated view of the path to the current page. e.g. Home/Draconic Evolution/Draconium Chest. It can be used to navigate to a previous page.
pi.intro.arrow_info.search_box.txt: This is a search box. Pretty self explanatory. It allows you to search for pages.
pi.intro.arrow_info.search_settings.txt: The search settings allow you to change the scope of the search.
pi.intro.arrow_info.settings.txt: Here you can find all of the settings for PI. It should be noted that all settings for PI are in game and there is no user editable config file.
pi.intro.arrow_info.minimize.txt: Minimize/Maximize allow you to change the size of this UI.
pi.intro.arrow_info.content_tabs.txt: TABS! Yes PI has tabs. When opening a page simply middle click or right click > Open in new tab.
pi.intro.arrow_info.content_window.txt: This is the content window. Its where the content is!
pi.internet_access_info.txt: Please be aware as all project intelligence documentation is stored online the mod requires internet access to function correctly.
pi.internet_access_more_info.txt: 首次启动 PI 后，将下载并缓存已安装模组的所有可用文档页面。 任何图像都会根据需要下载并缓存，以减少互联网的使用。
pi.internet_access_denied.txt: 请注意，PI 目前不支持在“离线模式”中运行。如果您想要在将来使用PI，您需要保证联网。
